qa_test: People: Page content present & People: Populations route loads
change_summary: Added warning banner noting that Populations feature is currently in development and may not be available in all workspaces
verified_against: Screenshot shows 'Stay tuned! We're working on unveiling the new populations feature in your workspace' empty state message
reasoning: Documentation describes Populations as a fully functional feature with cards, charts, and analytics. However, the actual UI on staging shows an empty state with 'Stay tuned!' message indicating the feature is still being developed. Added a warning banner to inform users that this feature may not be available yet.
